entry.title: $2562 // Renovated sunny 1 Br. No Fee. 1 month Free.
entry.content:
Renovated sunny 1 Br. No Fee. 1 month Free.

Listing ID #: 491800
Price: $2,562
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: Pets OK

Apartment Amenities

Hardwood
Marble Bath
Granite Kitchen
NO FEE

Beautifully renovated 1 bedroom on the UWS! Apartment boasts hardwood floors throughout, granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances. Pets OK.Rent shown is net effective.

Low rise well kept building.Walk up.

Right by the 1 train at 79th street. Several other lines very close by. Lots of great restaurants, shops and more nearby.
